name: Confessions of a Girl Gang
description:
Anna, Bea, Carlotta, Dora, Ella and Flora are friends. They are teenagers like the others. In their daily lives, they all suffer from systemic patriarchal oppressions. Oppressions which, by dint of making them suffer and gradually pushing them away, will go so far as to trigger a drama.

But thanks to a mysterious and unexplained rebirth, Flora gains the power to replay the past and perhaps come to the aid of her friends.

- - -

Space to launch the game and act.

My first video game submission, created during the GameDevTV Game Jam 2022.
All Assets were created by myself. And I liked it ^^

Thanks to Ugo for the soundtrack <3
